messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Easy Bake Oven tip
messages.msgSnippet: Besides using the recipes on the web, you can also buy cheap boxed cake or cookie mixes and let them use them a little at a time.  Look for the ones that just
messages.messageBody:
Besides using the recipes on the web, you can also buy cheap boxed cake or
cookie mixes and let them use them a little at a time. Look for the ones
that just need water and oil. Sometimes we break an egg and keep it in a
bowl in the fridge and use a spoonful of it as needed too. It's pretty
cheap and easy that way.

Angela
game-enthusiast@...

messages.subject: Easy Bake Oven tip
messages.msgSnippet: Gee, I google everything nearly, I never thought to google that. We sit here not making easy bake oven treats a lot, because we are out of stuff and they are
messages.messageBody:
Gee, I google everything nearly, I never thought to google that. We sit here not making easy bake oven treats a lot, because we are out of stuff and they are so expensive. Thanks for the tip, I will definitely do it!
Laura


--Laura Padberg

"Children do not need to be made to learn about the world, or shown how. They want to and they know how." John Holt
